name: Looping Crystal
description:
Synopsis

Nea, a young explorer goes into a mysterious cave, without knowing what mysteries are hidden in it. Due to a magic coming from the cave , you must help to get out of there and solve the mystery.

Objective

Your objective is helping Nea to find a way out from the creepy cave by unlocking some mechanics during the gameplay.

Moreover, there are 4 collectionables ( ) that you can pick them up.

Controls Initial
  • Movement:  'A' / 'D' or 'LEFT ARROW' / 'RIGHT ARROW'.
Unlockeable mechanics
  • Jump:  'SPACE'.
  • Dash:  'C' while pressing movement keys and releasing 'SPACE'.  
  • Climb:  Get next to a scaleable wall and:
    • 'W' / 'S' or 'UP ARROW' / 'DOWN ARROW' to go up or down. 
  • Glide:  hold 'SPACE'.
  • Jump Wall:  'SPACE' on a scaleable wall.
Credits

All the game art, including the font and the menu music, has been created by our team. No external assets have been used despite of:

  •  The song 'Walls and Lamps' created by Alexandr Zhelanov.
  • 'Cinemachine' from the Unity Package Manage.

Thank you for playing our game. We really hope that you enjoy it!!
